SELECT id , create_time , update_time , image , `name` , price , info , `order`, weight_list, taste_list, practice_list, ishide FROM food WHERE 1=1 AND menu_classify_id = #{classify} AND name like "%"#{foodName}"%" ORDER BY `order` ASC, create_time DESC LIMIT #{currentPage}, #{pageSize}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO food ( id, create_time, update_time, image, `name`, price, info, menu_classify_id, `order`, stock, weight_list, taste_list, practice_list, ishide ) VALUES ( #{id}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP (), CURRENT_TIMESTAMP (), #{image}, #{name}, #{price}, #{info}, #{menuClassifyId}, #{order}, #{stock}, #{weightList}, #{tasteList}, #{practiceList}, #{ishide} ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE update_time = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ()
mapper.select: SELECT id , create_time , update_time , image , `name` , price , info , `order`, weight_list, taste_list, practice_list FROM food WHERE id = #{id}
